title: Ep.13: Minshew Mania, Klay Thompson, College Football Playoffs, Steelers, NFL Predictions, and More
description: It was a wild weekend and Griffin remains undefeated in his bets against Joe. How will Klay Thompson fit back in with the Warriors after two years injured? Can anyone beat Alabama for the national championship? Can the Steelers sneak into the playoffs? Tune in!!
dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
itunes:summary: It was a wild weekend and Griffin remains undefeated in his bets against Joe. How will Klay Thompson fit back in with the Warriors after two years injured? Can anyone beat Alabama for the national championship? Can the Steelers sneak into the playoffs? Tune in!!
